ASSET
{Asset Source for Software Engineering Technology}

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Asset \As"set\, n. Any article or separable part of one's assets. [1913 Webster]
asset n : a useful or valuable quality [syn: {plus}] [ant: {liability}]
